blockdesc-crop-sisal-*: Not Mature Yet, will give One leaf, Use a Knife
blockdesc-crop-sisal-5: Mature Sisal, Not Flowering Yet, will give some leaves, but not Seeds, Use a Knife
blockdesc-crop-sisal-6: Ready to Harvest, Will Give Plenty of Leaves and Seeds, Use a Knife
blockdesc-trough-neolithic-genericwood-s: For feeding small animals with grain (1 per portion)
block-roof-wall-acacia-bark-*: Barked Barked Acacia Log roof Wall
blockdesc-dead-chicken-*: Use a Knife to get feathers, chicken meat and some fat.
blockdesc-dead-rabbit-*: Use a knife to get rabbit meat, A chance of a pelt or hide.
blockdesc-dead-fox-*: Use a knife to get fox meat, A chance of a pelt or hide.
blockdesc-dead-*: Use a saw for a chance to get a Head Trophy, Use a knife for a chance to get a pelt otherwise, hides.
blockdesc-dead-rotten-*: The Carrion Cannot be destroyed, it will turn into a Skeleton
blockdesc-skeleton-small: Harvest with a knife to get a pile of small bones
blockdesc-skeleton-large: Harvest with an Axe to get 4 large bones and 2 piles of small bones
blockdesc-headless-*: Use a Knife to skin the animal, with a chance for a nice Pelt or some hide
blockdesc-skinned-*: Use a Knife to harvest meat, fat, tendons,bones and a chance for a nice Skull
blockdesc-skinnedheadless-*: Use a Knife to harvest meat, fat, tendons and bones
blockdesc-bighornpelt-ground-*: In the crafting grid a Knife on top of Pelt will make 1 Rug and 4 leather strips.
blockdesc-bighornrug-ground-*: In the crafting grid a Knife on top of Rug will make 5 Raw-Hides.
blockdesk-boarpelt-ground-*: In the crafting grid a Knife on top of Pelt will make 1 Rug and 4 Leather Strips.
blockdesk-boarrug-ground-*: In the crafting grid a Knife on top of Rug will make 7 Raw-Hides.
blockdesc-foxpelt-*: In the crafting grid a Knife on top of Pelt will make 1 Raw-Hide.
blockdesc-rabbitpelt-*-ground-*: In the crafting grid a Knife on top of Pelt will make 1 Raw-Hides.
blockdesc-wolfpelt-*-*-*: In the crafting grid a Knife on top of Pelt will make 1 Rug and 4 leather strips .
blockdesc-pantherpelt-*-*-*: In the crafting grid a Knife on top of Pelt will make 1 Rug and 4 leather strips .
blockdesc-hyenapelt-*: In the crafting grid a Knife on top of Pelt will make 1 Rug and 4 leather strips .
blockdesc-wolfrug-*-*-*: In the crafting grid a Knife on top of Pelt will make 3 Raw-Hides.
blockdesc-pantherrug-*-*-*: In the crafting grid a Knife on top of Pelt will make 3 Raw-Hides.
blockdesc-hyenarug-*: In the crafting grid a Knife on top of Pelt will make 3 Raw-Hides.
itemdesc-carnivoremeat-cooked: Eat only in emergency, will satiate your hunger, but is bad for your health
itemdesc-foxmeat-cooked: Eat only in emergency, will satiate your hunger, but is bad for your health
itemdesc-bowlimb-carved: Carved limb made with a knife and stick. Combine with bowstring. A little better than a flimsy stick.
itemdesc-bowlimb-composite: Made by crafting glue with a slab of horn, carved limb and strip. Combine with bowstring. A real bow with good stopping power.
itemdesc-bowlimb-recurve: Made by combining glue and hide with a slab of horn, composite limb and strip.Combine with bowstring. Well worth the time and effort.
itemdesc-animal-large-bone: Crafting Grid with a knife to make arrow heads, Use for some tools also
itemdesc-animal-tendon: Use a knife to cut into usable strips
itemdesc-byproducts-sinew: Hammer into Sinew Fibers for thread, glue and rope. Also used to bind tools, bowstrings, and for composite bows.
itemdesc-byproducts-sinew-fibers: Hammered from strips. Combine 6 over a bowl then put in a fire to make glue. Or craft 3 horizontally to make Sinew Thread.
itemdesc-byproducts-sinew-thread: Crafted from 3 Sinew Fibers. Combine 6 Sinew Threads vertically to make a rope. Or combine 3 Sinew Thread and 2 Sinew to make bowstring with loops.  Future uses, sewing thread, fishing line.
itemdesc-byproducts-rope: Crafted from 6 threads. Currently no use except crafting equally useless lasso. Combine 4 in the top right corner and 1 on the left bottom to make a long lasso with a loop.
itemdesc-byproducts-lasso: Crafted from 5 rope. Currently no use.
itemdesc-byproducts-Fixedng: Crafted from 2 strips and 3 threads. Combine with stick for a simple vanilla bow. Or combine with crafted limbs to make bows. Carved limb, composite limb, recurve limbs are craftable.
itemdesc-animal-horn: Carve with a knife to get horn slabs which can be used to make advanced composite and recurve bows. Future use include tool handles and trade goods.
itemdesc-byproduct-bowlfiber: Crafted from 6 sinew fibers and a bowl. Cook in a fire pit to make glue. Glue is used for advanced crafting of composite and recurve bows. Future uses of glue include any tool construction.
itemdesc-byproducts-glue: From cooking fibers in a bowl. Glue is used for advanced crafting of composite and recurve bows. Future uses of glue include any tool construction.
itemdesc-byproducts-hornslab: Cut from an animal horn. Used to make advanced composite and recurve bows. Future use include tool handles and trade goods.
itemdesc-fletching-*: Not used yet.  A knife with feather, bamboo or vine will create the respective fletching. Could add immersion and alternate materials.
blockdesc-crop-sisal-*: Not Mature Yet, will give One leaf, Use a Knife
blockdesc-crop-sisal-5: Mature Sisal, Not Flowering Yet, will give some leaves, but not Seeds, Use a Knife
blockdesc-crop-sisal-6: Ready to Harvest, Will Give Plenty of Leaves and Seeds, Use a Knife
itemdesc-sisal-fibers: Put 3 in a row to make Sisal Thread
itemdesc-sisal-thread: Arrange in the grid 2 in row under 2 in row. Like a square to make Twine
itemdesc-sisal-twine: Fill the grid, 3 x 3 to make 3 Ropes
blockdesc-leavesbranchy-*-birch: Must use an axe to break
blockdesc-leavesbranchy-*-oak: Must use an axe to break
blockdesc-leavesbranchy-*-maple: Must use an axe to break
blockdesc-leavesbranchy-*-pine: Must use an axe to break
blockdesc-leavesbranchy-*-acacia: Must use an axe to break
blockdesc-leavesbranchy-*-kapok: Must use an axe to break
blockdesc-giantreed-arundo-*-normal: Use a knife to harvest a root that can be planted
